content.text: Okome is the first mate and the only known member of the Hokahoka Pirates.

Okome is a tall, but fat man with wide cheeks compared to a thin forehead, but seemingly no hair. He wears a yellow tricorne with a bowl of rice from Doskoi Panda on top of it, a purple captain's coat over the rest of his unseen attire.
Little is known about Okome's personality, but he was the only person who witnessed Bellamy's attack on Roshio and managed to keep a straight face.
Okome was present as an onlooker when Bellamy injured Roshio in Mock Town.

elements.text: His name means rice in Japanese, which is referenced by the bowl of rice on top of his head.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 24 Chapter 224 and Episode 146, Okome makes his debut.
↑  One Piece Blue: Grand Data File, Okome's name and status is given.
